hotels.title: Mauritius One&Only Beachfront Luxury with Poolside Cabanas & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Set along a gleaming stretch of private coastline on Belle Mare's peninsula is the five-star One&Only Le Saint Géran, the island's first-ever luxury hotel that set the standard for barefoot bliss in Mauritius. With One&Only's signature bespoke service and exquisite dining in one of the world's dreamiest locations, this is a true tropical paradise. Spend blissful days kayaking, snorkeling in the sheltered private lagoon, dining at the new Le Badamier al fresco restaurant (or any of the other five exquisite restaurants), or simply lounging in a cabana poolside. For utter indulgence, the One&Only Spa is heaven on Earth for bespoke treatments and head-to-toe pampering.
